alert.note: Alert for Nye (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 15 at 2:52PM PDT until July 15 at 3:15PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: The National Weather Service in Elko Nevada has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Nye County in south central Nevada... * Until 315 PM PDT. * At 251 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 15 miles northwest of Duckwater, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Nye County. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
